data.actual_result: Add button gets pushed off the modal.
data.expected_result: User gets added to the list and add button stays in the modal.
data.short_description: Users with a long username push group dm 'add' button off screen.
data.steps_to_repro: - Be in a group DM. - Be on latest canary so you get new invite modal. - Find a user with a very long username (like 32 W's). - Click their name to add them to the list.
